title: Shehbaz Sharif presented guard of honour at PM House
content:
ISLAMABAD, Mar 4 (APP): Prime Minister Shehbaz Sharif was presented a guard of honour on Monday as he arrived at the PM House soon after taking oath of his office here at the President House.
The national anthem was played and a smartly turned out contingent of the three services presented him salute.
The prime minister was later introduced to the staff of the Prime Minister House.
